mapper.select: select count(*) as likeCount from post_like where post_like.post_id = #{postId} and post_like.is_deleted = 0

SELECT pl.user_id as userId, u.nickname, u.username, COALESCE(gi.url, '') as avatar FROM post_like pl INNER JOIN user u ON pl.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN graph_info gi ON u.id = gi.item_id AND gi.item_type = 1 AND gi.is_deleted = 0 WHERE pl.is_deleted = 0 AND pl.post_id = #{postId} AND u.is_deleted = 0
SELECT DISTINCT post_id FROM post_like WHERE is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY post_id LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
